title: "In-field citrus fruit detection and tracking based on deep learning"
excerpt: "Recently, an article published in Horticulture Research proposed an in-field fruit counting method based on deep learning. The experiment was performed in two orange orchards in Meishan city in the Sichuan Province of China."
